text: wtkathrt brkt allh, wkathur khyrh, weazum mlkh, aladhi lah wahdah sultan alsmwat alsbe walardyn alsbe wama baynahuma min al'ashya' klha, waeindah eilm alsaaeat alty taqum fiha alqyamt, wyuhshr fiha alkhalq min qbwrhm limawqif alhsab, wa'iilayh turaddun - 'ayuha alnas- baed mmatkm, fyjazy kla bima ysthq
